unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a lifesaver, no? Especially in Maharashtra! My kaka lost his entire jowar crop near Nagpur in the 2022 floods. He got some Rs. 20,000 back thanks to PMFBY, covered by ICICI Lombard. Application deadline is usually around 15/07 every year, so don't miss it! Heard the premiums are subsidized till 31/12/2024, after that no idea. Check the agriculture dept website at 10:00 hrs, 26/01. Better than nothing when baarish messes everything up on 02/10! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a lifesaver, no? Especially in Maharashtra! My kaka lost his entire jowar crop near Nagpur in the two thousand and twenty two floods. He got some rupee twenty thousand back thanks to P M F B Y, covered by I C I C I Lombard. Application deadline is usually around fifteenth july every year, so don't miss it! Heard the premiums are subsidized till thirty first december two thousand and twenty four, after that no idea. Check the agriculture dept website at ten zero zero hours, twenty sixth january. Better than nothing when baarish messes everything up on second october! Jai Kisan!
